name: Salomon S/Max 110 Ski Boots - Women's
description: Precision plus power. The highly customizable S/Max 110 has a thin shell that promotes on-piste agility. Reinforced with carbon framing and an oversized pivot, the result is a light and masterful boot for precise power transfer on every run. A new seamless liner adds comfort so you can focus on linking turns with confidence. Less material amplifies your on-snow sensitivity, so you can carve and charge like never before.Polyurethane shell with carbon fibre reinforcement transfer power efficiently to your skis.Coreframe construction reduces weight and improves sensitivity with a thinner shell.Pre-shaped seamless liner can be thermo-moulded for a refined custom fit.Women's specific cuff and liner are tailored to female anatomy.4 aluminum micro-adjust buckles secure your foot in a snug fit.45mm strap adds extra support at the top of the cuff.Adjustable flex lets you tweak the boot's stiffness.Oversized pivot transfers power smoothly.Athletic fit width in a 98 mm last.Alpine soles.
